comments.body:
tojson already escapes.

https://flask.palletsprojects.com/en/1.1.x/api/?highlight=tojson#module-flask.json

> The htmlsafe_dumps() function of this json module is also available as a filter called |tojson in Jinja2. Note that in versions of Flask prior to Flask 0.10, you must disable escaping with |safe if you intend to use |tojson output inside script tags. In Flask 0.10 and above, this happens automatically (but itâ€™s harmless to include |safe anyway).
